TopicTitle: Game crash after 30 minutes/1 hour of playing

Articles.Content: i don't know why but my game start crashing after i play 30 minutes/1 hour. i upload 2 loghttps://drive.google.com/file/d/1nPzMxAS6iSFGNDp2IJoogFXsZzzc1HI7/view?usp=sharing    https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_DwCkauQO_z6m7Im5mVKvMq3nZrfUP4k/view?usp=sharing

OK, something is very very wrong with your KSP- those log files are over 100MB each! That’s not normal…

I didn’t download them as there’s no way I’m trying to look at logs that size on a tablet, but I’d suggest you post your KSP version and all installed mods, which are usually shown at the very beginning of KSP.log, and make sure the mods you’re using are all compatible with your version of KSP. (Hint: use CKAN, it does all that stuff for you).

1 hour ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

those log files are over 100MB each! That’s not normal…

Even my 2 hour sessions are typically 50-75MB, based on the number of mods.

Looking at the mods, there is a significant amount (I count at least 100-150). They usually add a lot of lines to logs.

So I would suggest getting CKAN to check most of them.

Wait, there are 2 AVCs, try deleting one of them, that usually causes problems for me.
